title: List Of Agent Projects
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: list-of-agent-projects-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: mv-749154131797
	- preferred-term:: List Of Agent Projects
	- source-domain:: metaverse
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on list of agent projects.
	- maturity:: mature
	- authority-score:: 0.85
	- owl:class:: mv:ListOfAgentProjects
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Concept
	- belongsToDomain:: [[MetaverseDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: list-of-agent-projects-relationships
		- enables:: [[ImmersiveExperience]], [[Presence]], [[SpatialComputing]]
		- requires:: [[DisplayTechnology]], [[TrackingSystem]], [[RenderingEngine]]
		- bridges-to:: [[HumanComputerInteraction]], [[ComputerVision]], [[Robotics]]

	- #### OWL Axioms
	  id:: list-of-agent-projects-owl-axioms
	  collapsed:: true
		- ```clojure
		  Declaration(Class(mv:ListOfAgentProjects))

		  # Classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:ListOfAgentProjects mv:ConceptualEntity)
		  SubClassOf(mv:ListOfAgentProjects mv:Concept)

		  # Domain classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:ListOfAgentProjects
		    ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain)
		  )

		  # Annotations
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:ListOfAgentProjects "List Of Agent Projects"@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:ListOfAgentProjects "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on list of agent projects."@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(dcterms:identifier mv:ListOfAgentProjects "mv-749154131797"^^xsd:string)
		  ```

- Agent Projects
	- General Purpose Agents
		- [AgentOps](https://github.com/AgentOps-AI/agentops) - Build your next agent with graphs, monitoring, and replay analytics. Tools to make agents that work. No more black boxes and prompt guessing.
		- [Adala](https://github.com/HumanSignal/Adala) - Adala is an Autonomous Data (Labeling) Agent framework.
		- [AgentGPT](https://github.com/reworkd/AgentGPT) - Assemble, configure, and deploy autonomous AI Agents in your browser.
		- [AgentPilot](https://github.com/jbexta/AgentPilot) - Integrated into Open Interpreter and MemGPT.
		- [Agents](https://github.com/aiwaves-cn/agents) - A systematic framework for training language agents, which is inspired by the connectionist learning procedure used for training neural nets.
		- [AutoGPT](https://github.com/Significant-Gravitas/AutoGPT) - Working Towards an Open Source AI Assistant Available To Everyone
		- [BabyAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi) - The system uses OpenAI and vector databases such as Chroma or Weaviate to create, prioritize, and execute tasks. The main idea behind this system is that it creates tasks based on the result of previous tasks and a predefined objective.
		- [BabyBeeAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi/blob/main/classic/BabyBeeAGI.py) - BabyBeeAGI: Task Management and Functionality Expansion on top of BabyAGI
		- [BabyCatAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi/blob/main/classic/BabyCatAGI.py) - This was built as a continued iteration on the original BabyAGI code in a lightweight way.
		- [BabyDeerAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi/blob/main/classic/BabyDeerAGI.py) - A mod of BabyCatAGI, which is a mod of BabyBeeAGI, which is a mod of OG BabyAGI. BabyDeerAGI is at ~350 lines of code.
		- [BabyElfAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi/blob/main/classic/BabyElfAGI/main.py) - Most recent mod of OG BabyAGI. Added Skills class and example tasklists.
		- [BabyCommandAGI](https://github.com/saten-private/BabyCommandAGI) - Designed to test what happens when you combine CLI and LLM, which are older computer interfaces than GUI. Based on BabyAGI, and using GPT-4 API. Imagine LLM and CLI having a conversation.
		- [BabyFoxAGI](https://github.com/yoheinakajima/babyagi/tree/main/classic/babyfoxagi) - A mod of BabyElfAGI, in a series of mods w the naming of BabyAGI in alphabetical order.
		- [BeeBot](https://github.com/AutoPackAI/beebot) - BeeBot is your personal worker bee, an Autonomous AI Assistant designed to perform a wide range of practical tasks autonomously.
		- [CAMEL](https://github.com/camel-ai/camel) - An open-source library designed for the study of autonomous and communicative agents. 1)AI user agent: give instructions to the AI assistant with the goal of completing the task.
		- [evo.ninja](https://github.com/agentcoinorg/evo.ninja) - Evo utilizes pre-defined agent personas that are tailored to specific domains of tasks. Each iteration of evo's execution loop it will select and adopt the persona that fits the task at hand best.
		- [GodMode](https://github.com/FOLLGAD/Godmode-GPT) - Godmode is a web platform to access the powers of autoGPT and babyAGI. AI agents are still in their infancy, but they are quickly growing in capabilities, and we hope that Godmode will enable more people to tap into autonomous AI agents even in this early stage.
		- [JARVIS](https://github.com/microsoft/JARVIS) - JARVIS is to explore artificial general intelligence (AGI) and deliver cutting-edge research to the whole community.
		- [Langroid](https://github.com/langroid/langroid) - Langroid is an intuitive, lightweight, extensible and principled Python framework to easily build LLM-powered applications, from ex-CMU and UW-Madison researchers.
		- [Local GPT](https://github.com/PromtEngineer/localGPT) - LocalGPT is an open-source initiative that allows you to converse with your documents without compromising your privacy. Inspired by privateGPT, allows using your own documents as an information source.
		- [Loop GPT](https://github.com/farizrahman4u/loopgpt/tree/mainn) - Modular Auto-GPT Framework
		- [L2MAC](https://github.com/samholt/l2mac) - L2MAC is a multi-agent generation framework that, a single input prompt can generate an extensive unbounded output, such as an entire codebase or an entire book.
		- [Mini AGI](https://github.com/muellerberndt/mini-agi) - MiniAGI is a minimal general-purpose autonomous agent based on GPT-3.5 / GPT-4. Can analyze stock prices, perform network security tests, create art, and order pizza.
		- [Multiagent Debate](https://github.com/composable-models/llm_multiagent_debate) - Multiagent Debate is an implementation of the paper "Improving Factuality and Reasoning in Language Models through Multiagent Debate".
		- [Multi GPT](https://github.com/sidhq/Multi-GPT) - An experimental open-source attempt to make GPT-4 fully autonomous
		- [OpenAgents](https://github.com/xlang-ai/OpenAgents) - OpenAgents is an Open Platform for Language Agents in the Wild, ChatGPT Plus Replica for Researchers, Developers, and General Users.
		- [OpenAGI](https://github.com/agiresearch/OpenAGI) - OpenAGI is an open-source AGI R&D platform that enables agents for both benchmark tasks and open-ended tasks
			- [Suspicion Agent](https://github.com/CR-Gjx/Suspicion-Agent) - The implementation of "Suspicion-Agent: Playing Imperfect Information Games with Theory of Mind Aware GPT-4"
		- [Taxy AI](https://github.com/TaxyAI/browser-extension) - Taxy uses GPT-4 to control your browser and perform repetitive actions on your behalf
		- [Teenage AGI](https://github.com/seanpixel/Teenage-AGI/blob/main/README.md#experiments) - A BabyAGI-inspired agent that can recall infinite memory, "thinks" before making action, and doesn't lose memory after being shutting down
		- [UFO](https://github.com/microsoft/UFO) - UFO is a UI-Focused dual-agent framework to fulfill user requests on Windows OS by seamlessly navigating and operating within individual or spanning multiple applications.
	- DIY/Build Your Own Agent Frameworks
		- [Agent4Rec](https://github.com/LehengTHU/Agent4Rec) - A recommender system simulator with 1,000 LLM-empowered generative agents.
		- [AgentForge](https://github.com/DataBassGit/AgentForge) - A low-code framework designed for the swift creation, testing, and iteration of AI-powered autonomous agents and Cognitive Architectures, compatible with various LLM models.
		- [AgentVerse](https://github.com/OpenBMB/AgentVerse) - Designed to facilitate the deployment of multiple LLM-based agents in various applications. AgentVerse primarily provides two frameworks: task-solving and simulation.
		- [AI Legion](https://github.com/eumemic/ai-legion) - An LLM-powered autonomous agent platform
		- [AutoGen](https://github.com/microsoft/autogen) - Enable Next-Gen Large Language Model Applications.
		- [ChatArena](https://github.com/Farama-Foundation/chatarena) - A Multi-Agent Language Game Environments for LLMs. The goal is to develop communication and collaboration capabilities of AIs.
		- [ChatDev](https://github.com/OpenBMB/ChatDev) - Create Customised Software using Natural Language Idea (through LLM-powered Multi-Agent Collaboration)
		- [CrewAI](https://github.com/joaomdmoura/crewai) - AI Agents reimagined for engineers
		- [Databerry](https://github.com/gmpetrov/databerry) - No-code platform for building custom LLM Agents.
		- [DemoGPT](https://github.com/melih-unsal/DemoGPT) - Build a quick demo based on your prompt
		- [dotagent](https://github.com/dot-agent/nextpy) - An agent management system that facilitates the creation of robust AI applications and experimental autonomous agents through a rich suite of developer tools.
		- [Eidolon](https://github.com/eidolon-ai/eidolon) - An open source SDK for AI agents
		- [Flowise AI](https://github.com/FlowiseAI/Flowise) - Build LLMs Apps Easily. Open source UI visual tool to build your customised LLM flow using LangchainJS, written in Node Typescript/Javascript
		- [GPTSwarm](https://github.com/metauto-ai/GPTSwarm) - GPTSwarm is a graph-based framework for LLM-based agents.
		- [IX](https://github.com/kreneskyp/ix) - IX is a platform for designing and deploying autonomous and [semi]-autonomous LLM powered agents and workflows.
		- [LLM Stack](https://github.com/trypromptly/LLMStack) - LLMStack is a no-code platform for building generative AI agents, workflows and chatbots, connecting them to your data and business processes.
		- [MetaGPT](https://github.com/geekan/MetaGPT) - MetaGPT is a multi-agent framework that, given one line requirement, returns PRD, Design, Tasks, or Repo.
		- [SuperAgent](https://github.com/superagent-ai/superagent) - Build, deploy, and manage LLM-powered agents
		- [SuperAGI](https://github.com/TransformerOptimus/SuperAGI) - Dev-first opensource AI agents framework to build, manage & run autonomous agents
	- Coding Agents
		- [Aider](https://github.com/paul-gauthier/aider) - A command line tool that lets you pair program with GPT-3.5/GPT-4, to edit code stored in your local git repository.
		- [Automata](https://github.com/emrgnt-cmplxty/automata) - Automata's objective is to evolve into a fully autonomous, self-programming Artificial Intelligence system.
		- [AutoPR](https://github.com/irgolic/AutoPR) - Fix issues with AI-generated pull requests, powered by ChatGPT
		- [BambooAI](https://github.com/pgalko/BambooAI) - A lightweight library that leverages Language Models (LLMs) to enable natural language interactions, allowing you to source and converse with data.
		- [Bloop](https://github.com/BloopAI/bloop) - Find Code. Fast. Understand codebases with GPT-4 and semantic code search
		- [BondAI](https://github.com/krohling/bondai) - A highly capable, autonomous AI Agent with an easy to use CLI, RESTful/WebSocket API, Pre-built Docker image and a robust suite of integrated tools.
		- [bumpgen](https://github.com/xeol-io/bumpgen) - Bumpgen builds your project to understand what broke when a dependency was bumped.
		- [Clippy](https://github.com/ennucore/clippinator) - Develop code for or with the user. It can plan, write, debug, and test some projects autonomously.
		- [CodeFuse-ChatBot](https://github.com/codefuse-ai/codefuse-chatbot) - An intelligent assistant serving the entire software development lifecycle, powered by a Multi-Agent Framework, working with DevOps Toolkits, Code&Doc Repo RAG, etc.
		- [Cody by ajhous44](https://github.com/ajhous44/cody) - An AI assistant designed to let you interactively query your codebase using natural language.
		- [Cody by Sourcegraph](https://github.com/sourcegraph/sourcegraph/tree/main/client/cody) - An AI code assistant from Sourcegraph that writes code and answers questions for you by reading your entire codebase and the code graph.
		- [Continue](https://github.com/continuedev/continue) - Leading open-source AI code assistant. You can connect any models and any context to build custom autocomplete and chat experiences inside VS Code and JetBrains.
		- [DevGPT](https://github.com/jina-ai/dev-gpt) - Code generation leverages a vectorized version of your repository, ensuring highly relevant and contextually useful code. Say goodbye to copy-pasting; the generated code appears directly in your editor.
		- [Devika](https://github.com/stitionai/devika) - Agentic AI Software Engineer that can understand high-level human instructions, break them down into steps, research relevant information, and write code to achieve the given objective. Devika aims to be a competitive open-source alternative to Devin by Cognition AI.
		- [DevOpsGPT](https://github.com/kuafuai/DevOpsGPT) - Multi agent system for AI-driven software development. Combine LLM with DevOps tools to convert natural language requirements into working software. Supports any development language and extends the existing code.
		- [English Compiler](https://github.com/uilicious/english-compiler) - POC AI based Compiler, for converting english based markdown specs, into functional code
		- [Friday](https://github.com/amirrezasalimi/friday/) - Friday is a developer agent that helps you quickly create applications with AI assistance.
		- [GeniA](https://github.com/genia-dev/GeniA) - GeniA is able to work along side you on your production enviroment, executing tasks on your behalf in your dev & cloud environments, AWS/k8s/Argo/GitHub etc.
		- [GPT Engineer](https://github.com/gpt-engineer-org/gpt-engineer) - Specify what you want it to build, the AI asks for clarification, and then builds it.
		- [GPT Migrate](https://github.com/joshpxyne/gpt-migrate) - Easily migrate your codebase from one framework or language to another.
		- [GPT Pilot](https://github.com/Pythagora-io/gpt-pilot) - GPT Pilot is an AI agent that codes the entire app as you oversee the code being written.
		- [LLM Agents](https://github.com/mpaepper/llm_agents) - A minimalistic library for building agents that leverage large language models to automate tasks through a loop of commands and tool integrations.
		- [Maige](https://github.com/RubricLab/maige) - Maige is a codebase agent that runs when new issues and pull requests come up. Its core features are labelling, assigning, and answering questions.
		- [Magick](https://github.com/Oneirocom/Magick) - Magick is an AIDE for creating, deploying, scaling, and monetizing useful AI agents, and prompt chaining.
		- [Mentat](https://github.com/AbanteAI/mentat) - AI tool that assists you with any coding task, right from your command line.
		- [OpenDevin](https://github.com/OpenDevin/OpenDevin) - The OpenDevin project is born out of a desire to replicate, enhance, and innovate beyond the original Devin model.
		- [OpenInterpreter](https://github.com/KillianLucas/open-interpreter) - A new way to use computers. Open Interpreter lets LLMs run code on your computer to complete tasks
		- [Pezzo](https://github.com/pezzolabs/pezzo) - Pezzo is a development toolkit designed to streamline prompt design, version management, publishing, collaboration, troubleshooting, observability and more
		- [React Agent](https://github.com/eylonmiz/react-agent) - The open-source React.js Autonomous LLM Agent
		- [Smol Developer](https://github.com/smol-ai/developer) - The first library to let you embed a developer agent in your own app!
		- [Stackwise](https://github.com/stackwiseai/stackwise) - Stackwise is a VS Code extension that writes and imports nodejs functions so that you can write code without context switching.
		- [SWE Agent](https://github.com/princeton-nlp/SWE-agent) - SWE-agent takes a GitHub issue and tries to automatically fix it, using GPT-4, or your LM of choice.
		- [Sweep](https://github.com/sweepai/sweep) - Sweep: open-source AI-powered Software Developer for small features and bug fixes.
	- Productivity Agents
		- [AIlice](https://github.com/myshell-ai/AIlice) - A fully autonomous, general-purpose AI agent. This project aims to create a standalone artificial intelligence assistant, similar to JARVIS, based on the open-source LLM.
		- [Cal.ai](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/tree/main/apps/ai) - Cal.ai can book meetings, summarise your week, and find time with others based on natural language.
		- [GPT Discord](https://github.com/Kav-K/GPTDiscord) - GPT Discord is a robust, all-in-one GPT interface for Discord.
		- [Lemon Agent](https://github.com/felixbrock/lemon-agent) - Lemon agent is a Plan-Validate-Solve (PVS) Agent for accurate, reliable and reproducable workflow automation.
		- [Self-operating computer](https://github.com/OthersideAI/self-operating-computer) - A framework to enable multimodal models to operate a computer.
	- Research Agents
		- [Devon](https://github.com/entropy-research/Devon) - Open-source alternative to Devin by Entropy research
		- [GPT Researcher](https://github.com/assafelovic/gpt-researcher) - GPT Researcher is a GPT-based autonomous agent that does online comprehensive research on any given topic.
			- [GPT Runner](https://github.com/nicepkg/gpt-runner) - Use GPT-Runner to manage your AI presets, engage in AI-powered conversations with your code, and significantly boost the development efficiency of both you and your team!
		- [Private GPT](https://github.com/imartinez/privateGPT) - Interact with your documents using the power of GPT, 100% privately, no data leaks
	- Analytics Agents
		- [MemGPT](https://github.com/cpacker/MemGPT) - A system that intelligently manages different memory tiers in LLMs to effectively provide the extended context within the LLM's limited context window.
	- Science Agents
		- [Chem Crow](https://github.com/ur-whitelab/chemcrow-public) - ChemCrow is an open source package for the accurate solution of reasoning-intensive chemical tasks. Built with Langchain, it uses a collection of chemical tools including RDKit, paper-qa, as well as some relevant databases in chemistry, like Pubchem and chem-space.
		- [NLSOM](https://github.com/mczhuge/NLSOM) - Mindstorm in Natural Language-based Societies of Mind
	- Assistant Agents
		- [Nelima](https://sellagen.com/nelima) - Nelima is designed for taking actions on your behalf with natural language commands.
		- [PromethAI](https://github.com/topoteretes/PromethAI-Backend) - Open-source framework that gives you AI Agents that help you navigate decision-making, get personalised goals and execute them
	- HR Agents
		- [Autonomous HR Chatbot](https://github.com/stepanogil/autonomous-hr-chatbot) - An autonomous HR agent that can answer user queries using tools

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable

properties.- definition: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on list of agent projects.
